title: Autopsy: Former NFL wide receiver Vincent Jackson died of chronic alcohol use
description: Former Chargers and Bucs WR, who died in February, suffered from alcoholic cardiomyopathy
content: The autopsy report on former NFL wide receiver Vincent Jackson concluded that the former San Diego Chargers and Tampa Bay Buccaneers star died of chronic alcohol use, according to a report by Rick Stroud of the Tampa Bay Times. Jackson, who played 12... [1977 chars]

title: Researchers recapitulate the human form of arrhythmogenic cardiomyopathy in zebrafish model
description: The research groups of Jeroen Bakkers (Hubrecht Institute/UMC Utrecht) and Toon van Veen (UMC Utrecht) bring forward the first patient-specific model for the heart disease arrhythmogenic cardiomyopathy (ACM).
content: The research groups of Jeroen Bakkers (Hubrecht Institute/UMC Utrecht) and Toon van Veen (UMC Utrecht) bring forward the first patient-specific model for the heart disease arrhythmogenic cardiomyopathy (ACM). They were able to recapitulate the human ... [3438 chars]

title: Drug improved cardiac structure and function in patients with early-stage hypertrophic cardiomyopathy
description: Valsartan, an angiotensin II receptor blocker drug, delayed disease progression and improved cardiac structure and function in patients with early-stage hypertrophic cardiomyopathy, according to results from a recent clinical trial published in Nature Medicine.
